alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 12:42PM MST until December 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO 6 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 60 below zero. * WHERE...Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from Noon Wednesday to 6 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen. Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will be coldest Wednesday night through early Thursday afternoon.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
